comments: Appears in the (n,k)-matching problem A076731. [Johannes W. Meijer, Jul 27 2011]
formula: T[n,m] = T[n,m-1]-T[n-1,m-1] with T[n,-1] = 0 and T[n,0] = A001563(n) = n*n!T(n,m) = sum(((-1)^j)*binomial(m+1,j)*(n+1-j)!, j=0..m+1) [Johannes W. Meijer, Jul 27 2011]
maple: A061312 := proc(n,m): add(((-1)^j)*binomial(m+1,j)*(n+1-j)!, j=0..m+1) end: seq(seq(A061312(n,m), m=0..n), n=0..7); [Johannes W. Meijer, Jul 27 2011]
author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Jun 06 2001
